name: url-capture
description: Chrome extension to capture and copy filtered URLs to clipboard

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp dist/src/presentation/popup/index.html dist/popup.html && cp dist/src/presentation/options/index.html dist/options.html && (cp icon*.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip . && cd .. && echo 'Created extension.zip'
